attributes.action: create legislation enforcing strict barrier procedures, to help prevent the spread of hospital accquired infections such as mrsa and c.diff
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i think it is ridiculous that only some hospital staff adhere to barrier procedures when woring with mrsa, c. diff patients. thiese procedures should apply to all who enter thatat patients room, why do visitors not have to follow the same procedures as medical staff/ domestics.  legislation should be passed enforcing these barrier procedures on everyone who enters a barrier room

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
